ygData.subject: Re: money?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve just arrived in Kaladim on my way to Kelethin and I m looking to make a little coin. What is this Belt Quest that you speak of? Would a Bard of the
ygData.messageBody:
I've just arrived in Kaladim on my way to Kelethin and I'm looking to make
a little coin. What is this Belt Quest that you speak of? Would a Bard of
the Seventh Circle be able to complete it?

Journeyman Plastos

At 08:51 PM 05/06/1999 PDT, you wrote:
>From: "John Hosenberg" <waper9@...>
>
>Well thanks all for the information, think I'll just rough it and stick in
>CB for money. Also I found the belt quest in Kaladim semi satisfying since
>I can drum run towards Kaladim and take those worthless belts to make 1 gp
>from gems or bandages and such which isn't too bad. Bards near Kelethin may
>want to check into this to boast their funds also since we got it rough both
>ways.
>
>
>Bryne
>10th circle
>Songweaver
>Bertoxx Server
